meanings.definition: A person who writes the text of an opera or other musical work.
meanings.sent1: The librettists carefully crafted the words for the new opera.
meanings.sent2: Many librettists work closely with composers to create beautiful music.
meanings.sent3: The librettists decided to write a musical about singing animals.
meanings.sent4: The librettists' words danced on the stage, bringing the story to life.
meanings.sent5: The talented librettists painted a vivid picture with their lyrical storytelling.
